    • Method Detail

      • setDictionary

        void setDictionary(java.lang.String[] words)
        Set dictionary words to pick secret words from.
        Parameters:
        words - an array of words.

      • selectRandomSecretWord

        java.lang.String selectRandomSecretWord()
        Pick a random secret word from dictionary and returns it.
        Returns:
        secret word.

      • guess

        java.lang.String guess(java.lang.Character c1)
        Receive a new user guess, and verify it against the secret word.
        Parameters:
        c1 - case insensitive user guess. If c is NULL then ignore it and do no change.
        Returns:
        secret word with hidden characters (use '-' instead unsolved characters), or return NULL if user reached max wrong guesses.

      • setMaxWrongGuesses

        void setMaxWrongGuesses(java.lang.Integer max)
        Set the maximum number of wrong guesses.
        Parameters:
        max - maximum number of wrong guesses, If is NULL, then assume it 0.
